issue.title: 10play.com.au
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://10play.com.au/live](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F10play.com.au%2Flive) ### Comment Username: @Cropmy5 > Having AdGuard annoyances filter ON prevents 10play from recognising that I'm already logged in. It therefore asks me to click sign in every time I navigate to the live channel stream. Turning OFF the filter fixes this issue. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/POsrY7W.png)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.forbes.com/sites/jacquelynsmith/2013/09/18/the-top-100-websites-for-your-career/?sh=3a7d49302a02](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forbes.com%2Fsites%2Fjacquelynsmith%2F2013%2F09%2F18%2Fthe-top-100-websites-for-your-career%2F%3Fsh%3D3a7d49302a02) ### Comment Username: @planet0 > Two annoyances: > - 'New!' popup when scrolling down and scrolling back up. > - Overlay popup when mouse cursor is moved away from the browser window content. ### Screenshots
